titleStmt.title: SII 7.936: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 936. (A.R. No. 307 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE PRAKARA OF THE TRIVIKRAMA TEMPLE AT TIRUKOILUR, SAME TALUK AND DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
tulyaM veṣṇavarakṣaiḥ
svasti śrī . tribhuvaṉaccakravatti koṉeriṉmaikoṇṭāṉ naṭuvilmaṇṭalattup peṇṇaivaṭakarai malāṭākiya jananāthavaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟukkaikkūṟṟattu tirukkovalūrppaṟṟil neṟkuṉṟattukku meṟkāṉa varadanāyakarcaturvedimaṅkalattu bhaṭṭarkaḷukku caturvedibhaṭṭarkaḷ
per Irupattunālukkum devabhāgaM śrīkailāsattukku bhāgaM Oṉṟum tirumeṟkoyilukku bhāgaM Oṉṟum vaidyabhāgaM Oṉṟum Āka bhāgaM Irupatteḻukku IṟaiyiliĀkat tanta nilamāvatu Ippaṟṟil teṉkarai tirukkovalūr periyerikkiḻ putuppeṟṟil kiḻkūṟum muvarāyarakarattukku vi
ṭṭa nilattukku kiḻakkum viraṭṭarakarattukku viṭṭa nilattukku teṟkkum Āviyūr Ellaikku meṟkkum kaccikkuvāccāṉ Ellaikku vaṭakkum Āka nāṉkellaikku Uṭpaṭṭa nilamum puṉcey nilattukku tirukkovalūr Ellaikku kiḻakkum maḻavarāyar Akarattukku viṭṭa nilattukku teṟkkum Ivvellaikku meṟkkum kiḻa
kkum tevaṅkuṭi Ellaikku meṟkkum kaccikkuvāccā ṉellaikku vaṭakkum Āka nāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa puṉceynilamum Aka Innilaṅkaḷil muṉpilāṇṭuvaraiyu maṉubhavittupponta palataḷi tevatāṉam tiruviṭaiyāṭṭam paḷḷiccantam bhaṭṭavṛtti Uḷḷiṭṭa nilaṅ
kaḷ nikki nāṉkellaik kuṭpaṭṭa nañcey puñceyyum maḻavarāyarakarattu nattan niṅkalāṉa nattaṅkaḷum Ivaiyiṟṟuk kuḷppaṭṭa maraṅkaḷ kiṇaṟukaḷ kuḷaṅkaḷ Entalkaḷ Āṟṟukkāl kaṇṇāṟukaḷ vāykkālkaḷ Uḷḷiṭṭa samasta prāptikaḷum Innilaṅkaḷ kārpacāṉam cittiraikkār ma
ṟu naviraik karumpu koḻuntu ceṅkaḻunir Uḷḷiṭṭa payirkaḷum vāḻai vaḻutilai Iñci mañcaḷ karuṇai ciṟukiḻaṅ kuḷḷuṭṭa vāṉpayirkaḷum teṅku kamuku māp palā Uḷḷuṭṭa taṇṭalaikaḷum varaku keḻvaraku payaṟu parutti Āmaṇak kuḷḷuṭṭa puṉpayirkaḷum ceyvittukkoḷḷavum Innilaṅkaḷil
varum kaṭamai poṉvari kāṇikkai viṉiyokam kācāyavaṟkam kāttikaippoṉ kāttikaippaccai taṟiyiṟai ceṭṭiṟai cekkiṟai taṭṭoli taṭṭārappāṭṭam Ērvari Iṉavari Iṭaivari maṉaivari Āyam kiṟṟu pañcupili cantuvikkirakappeṟu kāṇiyāṭcippeṟu cāmutāyappeṟu kāṭukāval paṭṭiṉippaku
ti koṟṟilakkai kaṭaikkūṭṭilakkai viṭaipper mātappaṭi taṇkūli cammātam vācalviṉiyokam Eḻuttuviṉiyokam Aricikāṇam vācalvari talaippaṇam naṟpacu nallerutu naṟkiṭā koṇikai kavantikai piḷḷaiyārnoṉpuppaccai Ācupotumakkaḷaik koḷḷum vari Eṇṇaippantam U
ḷḷuṭṭa Iṟaikaḷum Āṉaiccālai kutiraippanti viṭṭuttevai matiṭtevai taccaruḷḷuṭṭa kaṇmāḷar tevaikaḷum Uḷḷuṭṭa Iṟaikaḷ Upātikaḷ tevaikaḷ Ivaiyum Iḻantu paḻaṅkāṇiĀḷaraiyum taviṟtu Ippaṭikku variyilār kaṇakkilum niṟutti patiṉeṭṭāvatu mārkaḻimātammutal
mutalaṭaṅka Udakapūrvva dharmmadāṉamāka mutalaṭaṅka Iṟaiyiliyākat tantom Ippaṭikku kallilum cempilum veṭṭi candrādityavat·rai cella kāṇiyum Iṟaiyiliyumāka Aṉupavikka Eṉṟum Ivai cirāmatevaṉ Eḻuttu Eṉṟum Ivai kulacekara naraciṅkatevar
Eḻuttu Eṉṟum yāṇṭu 10 8 nāḷ 100 6 10 2 Eṉa
